name: CreateTrelloWebhook
description:
Create a new webhook in Trello.

This tool is used to create a new webhook on Trello. Use it when you need to set up a new webhook to track changes on Trello boards or cards.

parameters.name: webhook_callback_url
parameters.description: A valid URL that Trello can access with `HEAD` and `POST` requests. This is the endpoint where Trello will send webhook notifications.

value_schema.description: A valid URL that is reachable with a `HEAD` and `POST` request.

parameters.name: model_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello model (board or card) to be monitored by the webhook.

value_schema.description: ID of the model to be monitored

parameters.name: webhook_description
parameters.description: A string with a length from 0 to 16384 characters describing the webhook.

value_schema.description: A string with a length from `0` to `16384`.

parameters.name: webhook_active
parameters.description: Set to true if the webhook should be active and send POST requests; set to false to disable it.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the webhook is active and sending `POST` requests.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A string with a length from `0` to `16384`.

value_schema.description: A string with a length from `0` to `16384`.

parameters.name: callbackURL
parameters.description: A valid URL that is reachable with a `HEAD` and `POST` request.

value_schema.description: A valid URL that is reachable with a `HEAD` and `POST` request.

parameters.name: idModel
parameters.description: ID of the model to be monitored

value_schema.description: ID of the model to be monitored

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Determines whether the webhook is active and sending `POST` requests.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the webhook is active and sending `POST` requests.
